member.summary: Checks whether the site's administration domains are unique so the site can be started.
member.returns: true when the site's administration domains aren't colliding with and another site.

member.summary: Checks whether the given of the site is in collision with an another site.
member.param: Indicates if the given should be checked also against presentation URLs.
member.returns: true when the given is in collision.

member.summary: Retrieves the site alias based on given presentation URL.

member.summary: Retrieves the site alias based on given culture code.

member.name: T:CMS.SiteProvider.Internal.PresentationUrlNormalizer
member.summary: Normalizes presentation URL.

member.name: M:CMS.SiteProvider.Internal.PresentationUrlNormalizer.Normalize(System.String)
member.summary: Ensures correct format of the .

remarks.para:
Following rules are applied
Protocol is removed.
'www' is removed.
Trailing slash is ensured.
